name: 2022 5th International Conference on Robotics and Intelligent Technology
content: PUBLICATION: For papers submitted to ICRIT 2022, will be peer reviewed by both conference committees and IJMERR Editorial board, and accepted papers will be published in the International Journal of Mechanical Engineering and Robotics Research as a special issue, which will be indexed by Scopus, Index Corpernicus, ProQuest, UDL, Google Scholar, Open J-Gate, etc.
